entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
